@type.description: Either one of 'personal’ or 'work’. Default is 'personal’.

address.description: Valid email address in simple form. No brackets of any kind.

@disposable.description: Whether this is a disposable email (for example guerillamail.com). Response only. Omitted if false.

@email_provider.description: Whether this email came from a public provider (such as gmail.com). Response only.
